item.description:
Table 1: Top canonical pathways detected enriched for DEGs in bAM cells (infected with M. bovis) and hAM cells (infected with M. tuberculosis).

Bovine alveolar macrophage P-value Human alveolar macrophage P-value
Neuroinflammation Signalling Pathway 3.66 × 10-30 Neuroinflammation Signalling Pathway 7.36 × 10-29
Systemic Lupus Erythematosus In B Cell Signalling Pathway 1.79 × 10-28 TH1 and TH2 Activation Pathway 2.70 × 10-28
Role of Macrophages, Fibroblasts and Endothelial Cells In Rheumatoid Arthritis 7.01 × 10-27 Granulocyte Adhesion and Diapedesis 7.37 × 10-28
Hepatic Fibrosis Signalling Pathway 5.98 × 10-25 Glucocorticoid Receptor Signalling 3.26 × 10-24
Type I Diabetes Mellitus Signalling 6.11 × 10-25 Agranulocyte Adhesion and Diapedesis 4.01 × 10-24

References:

  1. Hall TJ, Mullen MP, McHugo GP, Killick KE, Ring SC, Berry DP, et al. Integrative genomics of the mammalian alveolar macrophage response to intracellular mycobacteria. bioRxiv. 2020.
  2. Krämer A, Green J, Pollard Jr J, Tugendreich S. Causal analysis approaches in Ingenuity Pathway Analysis. Bioinformatics. 2014; 30(4):523-30.
